name: XCOW - Leave The Humans, Take The Cows!
name_original: XCOW - Leave The Humans, Take The Cows!
description:
You must save your cows! Take and hide them in the barn before they are abducted by the aliens. Your mission is to save as many cows as you can! After you have collected 5 souls, right click and Death will help by building a barrier in front of the barn. Creditos: Arte: Jonas De Lima Programação: Marina Carvalho e Smailin Stocker SFX: Christopher Scullion Música: Lucas Hoffmann
